text: tavada obage deviyan (ovunta “me venuven) oba (ma hata) krtagna vuvahot (ma mage varaprasadayan nævatat) obata adhika kara dennemi. oba (mage varaprasadayanta krtagna novi) venaskam kalahot niyata vasayenma mage danduvama itamat darunu ekak vasayen tikhenu æta” yayi prakasayata pat kirima yannada (nabiye!) oba (movunta) matak kara denu
